import InputMask from "react-input-mask"; import React, {useState} from "react"; import { useData } from "./DataContext"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; import * as yup from "yup"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ firstName: yup .string() .matches(/^([^0-9]*)$/, "First name should not contain numbers") .required("First name is a required field"), lastName: yup .string() .matches(/^([^0-9]*)$/, "Last name should not contain numbers") .required("Last name is a required field"), }); function FormFeedback() { return (

Наш эксперт развлечений ответит на все ваши вопросы.
) } export default FormFeedback;
